mapper.select: SELECT A.PRPS_ID, A.PRPS_NM, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00021' AND E.CMM_CD = A.PRPS_PURPOSE_CD) AS PRPS_PURPOSE_CD_NM, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00022' AND E.CMM_CD = A.ACT_PLAN_CD) AS ACT_PLAN_CD_NM, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.PRPS_STR_DT, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y.%m.%d ') AS PRPS_STR_DT1, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.PRPS_END_DT, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y.%m.%d ') AS PRPS_END_DT1, A.PRPS_STR_DT , A.PRPS_END_DT, A.PRPS_PURPOSE_CD, A.ACT_PLAN_CD, (SELECT D.OUTLET_NM FROM T_VENDOR_M D WHERE D.VENDOR_NO = A.OUTLET_NO) AS VD_NM, A.OUTLET_NO, A.WHOLESALE_VENDOR_NO, A.MARKET_DIVS_CD, A.VENDOR_SGMT_DIVS_CD, A.BUDG_AMT,A.BASE_PRPS_AMT, A.LAST_PRPS_AMT, A.CASERATE_AMT, A.PRPS_CNTN, A.PRPS_STUS_CD, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00020' AND E.CMM_CD = A.PRPS_STUS_CD) AS PRPS_STUS_CD_NM FROM T_PROPOSAL_M A, T_EMP_M B WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND A.PRPS_ID = #{prps_id}

SELECT A.PRPSD_ID, A.PRPS_ID,A.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, '제안제품' AS PROD_SITEM_DIVS_NM, CONCAT(A.BRAND_NM,' ', A.SUB_BRAND_NM ,' ', A.PROD_ML_NM ) AS PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, A.DELIVERY_CNT, A.DELIVERY_AMT, A.DC_RATE, A.LAST_DELIVER_AMT FROM( SELECT TPPD.PRPSD_ID, TPPD.PRPS_ID,TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, (SELECT TBM.BRAND_NM FROM T_BRAND_M TBM WHERE TBM.BRAND_ID = TPM.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM, (SELECT SBM.SUB_BRAND_NM FROM T_SUB_BRAND_M SBM WHERE SBM.BRAND_ID = TPM.BRAND_ID AND SBM.SUB_BRAND_ID = TPM.SUB_BRAND_ID) AS SUB_BRAND_NM , (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = TPM.PROD_ML_CD) AS PROD_ML_NM, TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT, TPPD.DELIVERY_AMT, TPPD.DC_RATE, TPPD.LAST_DELIVER_AMT FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD, T_PROD_M TPM WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID = #{prps_id} AND TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM = TPM.PROD_NO AND TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD='01' ) A UNION ALL SELECT TPPD.PRPSD_ID, TPPD.PRPS_ID, TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, '지원품목' AS PROD_SITEM_DIVS_NM, TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT, TPPD.DELIVERY_AMT, TPPD.DC_RATE, TPPD.LAST_DELIVER_AMT FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID = #{prps_id} AND PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD ='02'

SELECT A.PRPSD_ID, A.PRPS_ID,A.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, '제안제품' AS PROD_SITEM_DIVS_NM, CONCAT(A.BRAND_NM,' ', A.SUB_BRAND_NM ,' ', A.PROD_ML_NM ) AS PROD_NO_SITEM_NM2, A.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, A.DELIVERY_CNT, A.DELIVERY_AMT, A.DC_RATE, A.LAST_DELIVER_AMT FROM( SELECT TPPD.PRPSD_ID, TPPD.PRPS_ID,TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, (SELECT TBM.BRAND_NM FROM T_BRAND_M TBM WHERE TBM.BRAND_ID = TPM.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM, (SELECT SBM.SUB_BRAND_NM FROM T_SUB_BRAND_M SBM WHERE SBM.BRAND_ID = TPM.BRAND_ID AND SBM.SUB_BRAND_ID = TPM.SUB_BRAND_ID) AS SUB_BRAND_NM , (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = TPM.PROD_ML_CD) AS PROD_ML_NM, TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT, TPPD.DELIVERY_AMT, TPPD.DC_RATE, TPPD.LAST_DELIVER_AMT FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD, T_PROD_M TPM WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID = #{prps_id} AND TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM = TPM.PROD_NO AND TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD='01' ) A

SELECT TPPD.PRPSD_ID, TPPD.PRPS_ID, TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT, TPPD.DELIVERY_AMT, TPPD.DC_RATE, TPPD.LAST_DELIVER_AMT FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID = #{prps_id} AND PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD ='02'
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_PROPOSAL_M( PRPS_STR_DT, PRPS_END_DT, DEPT_NO, EMP_NO, WHOLESALE_VENDOR_NO, OUTLET_NO, MARKET_DIVS_CD, PRPS_NM, PRPS_PURPOSE_CD, ACT_PLAN_CD, BASE_PRPS_AMT, LAST_PRPS_AMT, BUDG_AMT, CASERATE_AMT, PRPS_CNTN, PRPS_REG_DT, PRPS_STUS_CD, VENDOR_SGMT_DIVS_CD, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID ) VALUES ( #{prps_str_dt}, #{prps_end_dt}, #{dept_no}, #{emp_no}, #{wholesale_vendor_no}, #{outlet_no}, #{market_divs_cd}, #{prps_nm}, #{prps_purpose_cd}, #{act_plan_cd}, #{base_prps_amt}, #{last_prps_amt},#{ budg_amt}, #{caserate_amt}, #{prps_cntn}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{prps_stus_cd}, #{vendor_sgmt_divs_cd}, now(), #{login_id}, now(), #{login_id} )
mapper.select: select D.PRPSD_ID, M.PRPS_ID, M.PRPS_STR_DT, M.PRPS_END_DT, D.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, D.DELIVERY_CNT, 0 PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT, (SELECT B.BRAND_NM FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND P.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM LIMIT 1 ) BRAND_NM, (SELECT SB.SUB_BRAND_NM FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND P.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM LIMIT 1) SUB_BRAND_NM, (SELECT (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = P.PROD_ML_CD) FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND P.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM LIMIT 1) PROD_ML_NM, TIMESTAMPDIFF(month, DATE_FORMAT(M.PRPS_STR_DT, '%Y-%m-01') , DATE_FORMAT(M.PRPS_END_DT, '%Y-%m-01')) AS monthCnt FROM T_PROPOSAL_M M, T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D D WHERE M.PRPS_ID = ${prps_id} AND M.PRPS_ID = D.PRPS_ID
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_PROPOSAL_PROD_MON_D (PRPS_ID, PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, DELIVERY_MON, PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES (#{prpsId}, #{prodSitemDivsCd}, #{prodNoSitemNm}, #{deliDate}, #{planCnt}, now(), #{login_id}, now(), #{login_id})

INSERT INTO T_PROPOSAL_PROD_MON_D (PRPS_ID, PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, DELIVERY_MON, PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT, REAL_DELIVERY_CNT, REAL_DELIVERY_CNTN , DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES (#{prpsId}, #{prodSitemDivsCd}, #{prodNoSitemNm}, #{deliDate}, #{planCnt}, #{real_delivery_cnt}, #{real_delivery_cntn}, now(), #{login_id}, now(), #{login_id})
